content: Hi all. I'm getting pulled back into HL7 2x related development work as of late. My question relates to HL7 conformance profiles and programmatic creation of Orion Health/Lyniate Rhapsody definition files (.s3d). Does anyone know of anything out there to facilitate the process? I've been out of it for a 6+ years and imagine there'd be something by now. This is the doc I'm trying to constrain for http://www.hl7.org/documentcenter/public/standards/dstu/V26_IG_VR_BAFDRPT_R1_STU2.1_2020APR.pdf
Replied you in the initial topic that Messaging Workbench creates profiles based on HL7v2 models, but obviously does not convert those to Rhapsody files.
But Rhapsody can import MWB files, at least a few years ago ..
